contents.value: ${AcrobaticsTR ? 5 + AGL + floor(level / 2) + Acrobaticssitmod - armorpen : AGL + floor(level / 2) + Acrobaticssitmod - armorpen}$

${Pokemon_CombatTR ? 5 + INT + floor(level / 2) + Pokemon_Combatsitmod : INT + floor(level / 2) + Pokemon_Combatsitmod}$
${SPT >= AWE ? BreedingTRvalue + SPT + floor(level / 2) + Breedingsitmod : BreedingTRvalue + AWE + floor(level / 2) + Breedingsitmod}$
${PokemonTR ? 5 + INT + floor(level / 2) + Pokemonsitmod : INT + floor(level / 2) + Pokemonsitmod}$
${ComputersTR ? 5 + INT + floor(level / 2) + Computerssitmod : INT + floor(level / 2) + Computerssitmod}$
${PerceptionTR ? 5 + AWE + floor(level / 2) + Perceptionsitmod - armorpen : AWE + floor(level / 2) + Perceptionsitmod - armorpen}$
${DeceptionTR ? 5 + SPT + floor(level / 2) + Deceptionsitmod - armorpen : SPT + floor(level / 2) + Deceptionsitmod - armorpen}$
${PersuasionTR ? 5 + SPT + floor(level / 2) + Persuasionsitmod : SPT + floor(level / 2) + Persuasionsitmod}$
${EnduranceTR ? 5 + VIT + floor(level / 2) + Endurancesitmod - armorpen : VIT + floor(level / 2) + Endurancesitmod - armorpen}$
${PsychonesisTR ? 5 + INT + floor(level / 2) + Psychonesissitmod : INT + floor(level / 2) + Psychonesissitmod}$
${INT >= AWE ? First_AidTRvalue + INT + floor(level / 2) + First_Aidsitmod : First_AidTRvalue + AWE + floor(level / 2) + First_Aidsitmod}$
${ScienceTR ? 5 + INT + floor(level / 2) + Sciencesitmod : INT + floor(level / 2) + Sciencesitmod}$
${HistoryTR ? 5 + INT + floor(level / 2) + Historysitmod : INT + floor(level / 2) + Historysitmod}$
${StealthTR ? 5 + AGL + floor(level / 2) + Stealthsitmod - armorpen : AGL + floor(level / 2) + Stealthsitmod - armorpen}$
${InsightTR ? 5 + AWE + floor(level / 2) + Insightsitmod : AWE + floor(level / 2) + Insightsitmod}$
${StreetwiseTR ? 5 + SPT + floor(level / 2) + Streetwisesitmod : SPT + floor(level / 2) + Streetwisesitmod}$
${STR >= SPT ? IntimidationTRvalue + STR + floor(level / 2) + Intimidationsitmod : IntimidationTRvalue + SPT + floor(level / 2) + Intimidationsitmod}$
${StylerTR ? 5 + SPT + floor(level / 2) + Stylersitmod : SPT + floor(level / 2) + Stylersitmod}$
${INT >= AWE ? InvestigationTRvalue + INT + floor(level / 2) + Investigationsitmod : InvestigationTRvalue + AWE + floor(level / 2) + Investigationsitmod}$
${SurvivalTR ? 5 + AWE + floor(level / 2) + Survivalsitmod : AWE + floor(level / 2) + Survivalsitmod}$
${MechanicsTR ? 5 + INT + floor(level / 2) + Mechanicssitmod : INT + floor(level / 2) + Mechanicssitmod}$
${AWE >= SPT ? TrainingTRvalue + AWE + floor(level / 2) + Trainingsitmod : TrainingTRvalue + SPT + floor(level / 2) + Trainingsitmod}$

contents.label: 3 : -6 on rolls. Half all speed capabilities.
4: -8 on rolls. Half all speed capabilities.
But first, why don't you tell me a little about yourself...

templateHistory.lhs:
Rolling Body save w/ ${!compareText(advantagecheck, string('kh')) != 0 ? "Disadvantage" : "Advantage"}$: 

${[2d20:advantagecheck:] + bodysave}$

Rolling Reflex save w/ ${!compareText(advantagecheck, string('kh')) != 0 ? "Disadvantage" : "Advantage"}$: 

${[2d20:advantagecheck:] + reflexsave}$

Rolling Mind save w/ ${!compareText(advantagecheck, string('kh')) != 0 ? "Disadvantage" : "Advantage"}$: 

${[2d20:advantagecheck:] + mindsave}$
